mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_card_order ( Card_Order_Id, Cash_Order_Id, Pay_User_Id, Paied_User_Id,
Book_Id,
Pay_Card_Amount,
Welfare_Card_Amount,
Create_Time, Order_Type, Order_Status, Ip ) VALUES ( #{sysCardOrder.cardOrderId}, #{sysCardOrder.cashOrderId}, #{sysCardOrder.payUserId}, #{sysCardOrder.paiedUserId},
#{sysCardOrder.bookId},
#{sysCardOrder.payCardAmount},
#{sysCardOrder.welfareCardAmount},
#{sysCardOrder.createTime}, #{sysCardOrder.orderType}, #{sysCardOrder.orderStatus}, #{sysCardOrder.ip} );
mapper.select: SELECT sco.Card_Order_Id AS cardOrderId, sco.Cash_Order_Id AS cashOrderId, sco.Pay_User_Id AS payUserId, sco.Paied_User_Id AS paiedUserId, sco.Pay_Card_Amount AS payCardAmount, sco.Welfare_Card_Amount AS welfareCardAmount, sco.Create_Time AS createTime, sco.Order_Type AS orderType, sco.Order_Status AS orderStatus, sco.Ip AS ip, sco.Update_Time AS updateTime, b.BookName AS bookName, u1.UserName AS payUserName, u2.UserName AS paiedUserName FROM sys_card_order AS sco, wor_book AS b, sys_user AS u1, sys_user AS u2, WHERE sco.Card_Order_Id = #{cardOrderId} AND ( sco.Book_Id = b.BookId OR sco.Book_Id IS NULL ) AND sco.Pay_User_Id = u1.UserId AND sco.Paied_User_Id = u2.UserId

SELECT sco.Card_Order_Id AS cardOrderId, sco.Cash_Order_Id AS cashOrderId, sco.Pay_User_Id AS payUserId, sco.Paied_User_Id AS paiedUserId, sco.Pay_Card_Amount AS payCardAmount, sco.Welfare_Card_Amount AS welfareCardAmount, sco.Create_Time AS createTime, sco.Order_Type AS orderType, sco.Order_Status AS orderStatus, sco.Ip AS ip, sco.Update_Time AS updateTime, b.BookName AS bookName, u1.UserName AS payUserName, u2.UserName AS paiedUserName FROM sys_card_order AS sco LEFT JOIN wor_book AS b ON sco.Book_Id = b.BookId, sys_user AS u1, sys_user AS u2 WHERE ( sco.Paied_User_Id = #{userId} OR sco.Pay_User_Id = #{userId} ) AND sco.Pay_User_Id = u1.UserId AND sco.Paied_User_Id = u2.UserId ORDER BY sco.Create_Time DESC
